definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: The bird in the clock gaily hops out and says cuckoo.
sentences.chinese: 鍾裏的小鳥愉快地跳出來，“布穀布穀”地叫着。

sentences.english: The bird in the clock gaily hops out and says cuckoo.
sentences.chinese: 鍾裏的小鳥愉快地跳出來，“布穀布穀”地叫着。

sentences.english: A cuckoo began calling from a hawthorn tree .
sentences.chinese: 一隻布穀鳥開始在一株山楂樹裏咕咕地呼叫。

sentences.english: Followed by reminders of Bulu, the season of the continuous rain.
sentences.chinese: 之後就是布穀催種，細雨綿綿的季節了。

sentences.english: Accompanied by cuckoo, the sun also ek-sistent smile. This is the beginning of this story.
sentences.chinese: 伴着布穀鳥的叫聲，太陽也綻出了笑容。

sentences.english: I came home just in time to hear the cuckoo clock cuckoo three times.
sentences.chinese: 我回到家時剛好聽到家裏的布穀鳥鐘響了三下。

sentences.english: The cuckoo harbingers the coming of spring.
sentences.chinese: 布穀鳥告知春天的到來。

sentences.english: The hour strikes and the melody of hundreds of grandfather and cuckoo clocks rings out.
sentences.chinese: 一到整點，成百上千的落地鍾和布穀鍾齊鳴。

sentences.english: They are looking at a cuckoo clock…
And what cuckoos say you know.
sentences.chinese: 你該知道布穀鳥怎麼叫。

sentences.english: I realized my wife would probably wake up, so I cuckooed another 9 times.
sentences.chinese: 我想老婆可能會醒來，於是學布穀鳥又多叫了九聲。

sentences.english: I think Boog can fly faster than you, huh?
sentences.chinese: 我想連布穀都可以飛得比你更快吧？

sentences.english: And what cuckoos says you know.
Who knew that the mild-mannered cuckoo clock could evolve into such a gruesome object?
sentences.chinese: 誰能想到布穀鍾也能演變成駭人的東西？

sentences.english: Gowk is another name for a cuckoo bird.
sentences.chinese: “杜鵑鳥”是“布穀鳥”的另一種叫法。

definition: postal kiosk/(old) rest shelter for couriers
lit. woodcutter's family/humble background/poor family background
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
